patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -13,9 +13,9 @@
     /* Neutral Colors */
     --white: hsl(0, 0%, 100%);          /* main container */
     --rose-white: hsl(330, 100%, 98%);  /* second container */
     --eggshell: hsl(30, 54%, 90%);      /* body */
-    --light-grey: hsl(30, 18%, 87%);
+    --light-grey: hsl(30, 18%, 87%);    /* shaddow */
     --wenge-brown: hsl(30, 10%, 34%);   /* regular font */
     --dark-charcoal: hsl(24, 5%, 18%);  /* bold font */
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -7,17 +7,17 @@
 }
 
 :root {
     /* Primary Colors */
-    --nutmeg: hsl(14, 45%, 36%);            /*  */
-    --dark-raspberry: hsl(332, 51%, 32%);
+    --nutmeg: hsl(14, 45%, 36%);            /* h2 */
+    --dark-raspberry: hsl(332, 51%, 32%);   /* h3 */
     /* Neutral Colors */
-    --white: hsl(0, 0%, 100%);          /* main container */
-    --rose-white: hsl(330, 100%, 98%);  /* second container */
-    --eggshell: hsl(30, 54%, 90%);      /* body */
-    --light-grey: hsl(30, 18%, 87%);    /* shadow */
-    --wenge-brown: hsl(30, 10%, 34%);   /* regular font */
-    --dark-charcoal: hsl(24, 5%, 18%);  /* bold font */
+    --white: hsl(0, 0%, 100%);              /* main container */
+    --rose-white: hsl(330, 100%, 98%);      /* second container */
+    --eggshell: hsl(30, 54%, 90%);          /* body */
+    --light-grey: hsl(30, 18%, 87%);        /* shadow */
+    --wenge-brown: hsl(30, 10%, 34%);       /* regular font */
+    --dark-charcoal: hsl(24, 5%, 18%);      /* bold font */
 }
 
 body {
     font-family: "Outfit", sans-serif;
